name: Data Access Security Report Shared
description: Notify user that a data access security report has been shared with them.
subject: $reportShare.subject
body:
Hello,

The user, $reportShare.senderName, shared the following report(s):
$reportShare.reportList

$reportShare.personalMessage

* This email is valid only for you. Please do not forward this email.

This is an automatic message sent to you by Data Access Security - Please do not reply.
